my.uum

Class databaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • my.uum.databaseManager

  • public class databaseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is to handle all database interactions. This uses JDBC-SQLite

      • insertUser

        public java.lang.String[] insertUser(java.lang.String staff_id,
                                     java.lang.String ic_No,
                                     java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String mobile_TelNo,
                                     java.lang.String email)
        Insert the user information entered by the user and save it into the database.
        Parameters:
        staff_id - Users need to fill in their staff id for their information.
        ic_No - Users need to fill in their IC Number for their information.
        name - Users need to fill in their name for their information.
        mobile_TelNo - Users need to fill in their Mobile Number for their information.
        email - Users need to fill in their Email for their information.
        Returns:
        Display the result.

      • insertBooking

        public java.lang.String[] insertBooking(java.lang.String room_id,
                                        java.lang.String booking_date,
                                        java.lang.String booking_time,
                                        java.lang.String booking_purpose,
                                        java.lang.String staff_id)
        Insert the booking details entered by the user and save them into the database.
        Parameters:
        room_id - Users need to choose the room id that they want to book.
        booking_date - Users need to give a date to book the room.
        booking_time - Users need to give time to book the room.
        booking_purpose - Users need to give the purpose for booking the room.
        staff_id - Users need to give their staff id to know who is booking the room.
        Returns:
        Display the result.

      • updateStatus

        public void updateStatus(java.lang.String room_id)
        Update the meeting room status to 'Reserved' when the user successfully books the meeting room.
        Parameters:
        room_id - The room id that the users choose to change the status.

      • updateStatusDelete

        public void updateStatusDelete(java.lang.String staffId)
        Update the status of the meeting room to 'Ready' when the user cancels booking the meeting room.
        Parameters:
        staffId - The staff id that the user enters to cancel the booking and the room ID taken by the user will be detected.
